languages.text: "Служители культа когда-то обитали в туннелях меж переборок отсеков. Но нити судьбы заплелись, и Домин, что правил много веков назад, даровал нам сей отсек. Мы взялись отстраивать просторные залы, в которых шептали о смерти и тени, и лики Его, и сами ткачи. Так храм, что ты видишь, менялся, пока сменялись Висири и поколения культа. Мы все еще строим его — неспешно, но верно".

"Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."
languages.original_text: "Служители культа когда-то обитали в туннелях меж переборок отсеков. Но нити судьбы заплелись, и Домин, что правил много веков назад, даровал нам сей отсек. Мы взялись отстраивать просторные залы, в которых шептали о смерти и тени, и лики Его, и сами ткачи. Так храм, что ты видишь, менялся, пока сменялись Висири и поколения культа. Мы все еще строим его — неспешно, но верно".

traits.locale_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

"The cult followers used to inhabit the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads. But the threads of fate were tangled and the temple was discovered one day. It used to be filled with faith, prayer, and service, but was forgotten and abandoned as a new sanctum succeeded to it. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the Weavers themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see was changing through a succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are still building it, slowly but surely."

"Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

"Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, but the threads of fate were tangled and that temple was eventually discovered. It was a place filled with faith, prayer, and service, but was forgotten and abandoned as a new sanctum succeeded it. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the Weavers themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are still building it, slowly but surely."

We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

"Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

languages.text: "Anhänger des Kultes lebten einst in den Tunneln zwischen den Schotten der Module, bis sich die Fäden des Schicksals verhedderten und uns ein Domin aus längst vergangener Zeit dieses Modul überließ. Wir haben begonnen, geräumige Hallen zu bauen, in denen die Schatten, die Bilder des Todlosen Imperators und die Spinner selbst vom Tod flüstern können. Und so begann der Tempel, den Ihr hier seht, sich zu verändern, von Wesir zu Wesir und von Generation zu Generation. Wir arbeiten noch immer an ihm. Langsam aber stetig."
languages.original_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

traits.locale_text: "Anhänger des Kultes lebten einst in den Tunneln zwischen den Schotten der Module, bis sich die Fäden des Schicksals verhedderten und uns ein Domin aus längst vergangener Zeit dieses Modul überließ. Wir haben begonnen, geräumige Hallen zu bauen, in denen die Schatten, die Bilder des Todlosen Imperators und die Spinner selbst vom Tod flüstern können. Und so begann der Tempel, den Ihr hier seht, sich zu verändern, von Wesir zu Wesir und von Generation zu Generation. Wir arbeiten noch immer an ihm. Langsam aber stetig."

"Anhänger des Kults haben einst die Tunnel zwischen den Schotten der Module bewohnt, doch durch die verworrenen Fäden des Schicksals wurde eines Tages dieser Tempel entdeckt. Er war einst erfüllt gewesen von Glauben, Gebet und Dienst, war jedoch nach der Eröffnung eines neuen Heiligtums aufgegeben worden und in Vergessenheit geraten. Wir haben begonnen, geräumige Hallen zu bauen, in denen die Schatten, die Bilder des Todlosen Imperators und die Weber selbst vom Tod flüstern können. Und so begann der Tempel, den Ihr hier seht, sich zu verändern, von Wesir zu Wesir und von Generation zu Generation. Wir bauen noch immer daran, langsam aber stetig."

languages.text: «Antaño, los seguidores del culto habitaban en los túneles que discurren entre las mamparas del navío, hasta que los hilos del destino se entrelazaron y un Domin nos cedió este compartimento. Nos afanamos en la construcción de salones espaciosos donde las sombras, Sus imágenes y los mismos tejedores pudieran susurrar sobre la muerte. Y así, el templo que ve ante sus ojos empezó a cambiar con los sucesivos visires y las nuevas generaciones del culto. Aún seguimos construyéndolo, paso a paso».
languages.original_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

traits.locale_text: «Antaño, los seguidores del culto habitaban en los túneles que discurren entre las mamparas del navío, hasta que los hilos del destino se entrelazaron y un Domin nos cedió este compartimento. Nos afanamos en la construcción de salones espaciosos donde las sombras, Sus imágenes y los mismos tejedores pudieran susurrar sobre la muerte. Y así, el templo que ve ante sus ojos empezó a cambiar con los sucesivos visires y las nuevas generaciones del culto. Aún seguimos construyéndolo, paso a paso».

«Antaño, los seguidores del culto habitaban en los túneles entre las mamparas de las bahías, pero los hilos del destino estaban enmarañados, y un día se descubrió este templo. Fue una vez un lugar lleno de fe, oraciones y servicio, pero un nuevo santuario lo reemplazó y cayó en el olvido. Nos afanamos en la construcción de salones espaciosos donde las sombras, Sus imágenes y los mismos tejedores pudieran susurrar sobre la muerte. Y así, el templo que ve ante sus ojos empezó a cambiar con los sucesivos visires y las nuevas generaciones del culto. Aún seguimos construyéndolo, paso a paso».

languages.text: 「運命の糸がもつれ、過去のドミンがこの区画を生み出すまで、教団の信者はベイの隔壁間のトンネルに住んでいました。我らは影や主の像、そして織り手自身が死を囁ける、広々とした広間の建設に取り掛かったのです。こうして今見えている神殿は、ヴィジールの教団の世代交代に伴って変わり始めました。我らは今も、ゆっくりと、しかし確実に、築き続けているのです」
languages.original_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

traits.locale_text: 「運命の糸がもつれ、過去のドミンがこの区画を生み出すまで、教団の信者はベイの隔壁間のトンネルに住んでいました。我らは影や主の像、そして織り手自身が死を囁ける、広々とした広間の建設に取り掛かったのです。こうして今見えている神殿は、ヴィジールの教団の世代交代に伴って変わり始めました。我らは今も、ゆっくりと、しかし確実に、築き続けているのです」

「教団の信者は、かつてはベイの隔壁間のトンネルに住んでいたが、運命の糸がもつれ、ある日、この神殿が発見されたのだ。かつては信仰や祈り、奉仕に満ちた場所だったが、新たなサンクトゥムがそれを引き継いだことで、忘れ去られ、放棄された。我々は影や主の像、そして織り手自身が死を囁ける、広々とした広間の建設に取り掛かった。こうして今見えている神殿は、ヴィジールの教団の世代交代に伴って変わり始めた。我らは今も、ゆっくりと、しかし確実に、築き続けている」

languages.text: “教派的追随者曾居住在甲板之间的隧道里，但命运的丝线交织在一起，某位许久以前的秘者指引我们找到了这座圣殿。我们开始着手建造宽敞的大厅，重建了祂的圣像，祂的影子与织网者的低语声颂唱着死亡。如您所见，织血罗网一代又一代的宿老与织网者建起了如今的圣殿。目前我们仍然在建造这座圣殿，尽管进度缓慢，但坚定不移。”
languages.original_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

traits.locale_text: “教派的追随者曾居住在甲板之间的隧道里，但命运的丝线交织在一起，某位许久以前的秘者指引我们找到了这座圣殿。我们开始着手建造宽敞的大厅，重建了祂的圣像，祂的影子与织网者的低语声颂唱着死亡。如您所见，织血罗网一代又一代的宿老与织网者建起了如今的圣殿。目前我们仍然在建造这座圣殿，尽管进度缓慢，但坚定不移。”
“教派的追随者曾居住在甲板之间的隧道里，但命运的丝线纠缠在一起，指引我们找到了这座圣殿。这个地方曾一度充满了信仰、祈祷与侍奉，但后来，新的圣殿出现了，而这里被人渐渐废弃、遗忘。我们开始着手建造宽敞的大厅，重建了祂的圣像，祂的影子与织网者的低语声颂唱着死亡。如您所见，织血罗网的众多宿老，以及一代又一代的织网者建起了如今的圣殿。目前我们仍然在建造这座圣殿，虽然进度缓慢，但坚定不移。”

languages.text: « Les disciples du culte occupaient autrefois les tunnels cachés entre les cloisons de la baie, mais les fils du destin se sont entremêlés et un Domin des temps passés nous a alloué ce compartiment. Nous nous sommes alors attelés à l'édification de salles spacieuses où les ombres, Ses images et les tisseurs eux-mêmes murmureraient à l'oreille de la mort. Et c'est ainsi que le temple que vous avez sous les yeux a commencé à changer à mesure que les vizirs et les générations de fidèles se succédaient. Sa construction se poursuit encore à ce jour, lentement mais sûrement. »
languages.original_text: "Followers of the cult once inhabited the tunnels between the bays' bulkheads, until the threads of fate were tangled and a Domin of ages past gave us this compartment. We set ourselves to building spacious halls where the shadows, the images of Him, and the spinners themselves would whisper of death. And thus the temple that you see began to change with the succession of Vizsiers and the cult's generations. We are building it still, slowly but surely."

traits.locale_text: « Les disciples du culte occupaient autrefois les tunnels cachés entre les cloisons de la baie, mais les fils du destin se sont entremêlés et un Domin des temps passés nous a alloué ce compartiment. Nous nous sommes alors attelés à l'édification de salles spacieuses où les ombres, Ses images et les tisseurs eux-mêmes murmureraient à l'oreille de la mort. Et c'est ainsi que le temple que vous avez sous les yeux a commencé à changer à mesure que les vizirs et les générations de fidèles se succédaient. Sa construction se poursuit encore à ce jour, lentement mais sûrement. »

« Les disciples du culte occupaient autrefois les tunnels cachés entre les cloisons de la baie, mais les fils du destin se sont entremêlés et l'existence de ce temple a fini par s'ébruiter. C'était un lieu entièrement dédié à la foi, à la prière et aux saints offices, mais il a été abandonné au profit d'un nouveau sanctum. Nous nous sommes alors attelés à l'édification de salles spacieuses où les ombres, Ses images et les tisseurs eux-mêmes murmureraient à l'oreille de la mort. Et c'est ainsi que le temple que vous avez sous les yeux a commencé à changer à mesure que les vizirs et les générations de fidèles se succédaient. Sa construction se poursuit encore à ce jour, lentement mais sûrement. »
